# Security Policy

## Reporting Security Vulnerabilities

If you discover a security vulnerability in this repository, please email:

**security@ia-pme.fr**

**Do NOT** open a public issue.

---

## Important Notes

⚠️ **This is a proprietary repository**

- This repository contains only marketing materials
- The complete IA-PME Suite source code is NOT public
- Attempting to reverse-engineer, fork, or copy this project violates the license

---

## What This Repository Contains

✅ Landing page (HTML/CSS only)  
✅ Marketing materials  
✅ Public documentation  

---

## What This Repository Does NOT Contain

❌ Application source code  
❌ Database schemas  
❌ API credentials  
❌ Training data  
❌ Proprietary algorithms  

---

## Security Best Practices for Users

- Never share credentials from IA-PME applications publicly
- Always use HTTPS for connections
- Keep your local deployment secure
- Report any security issues privately

---

## Legal

Any attempt to:
- Extract proprietary information
- Reverse-engineer applications
- Clone or copy this project
- Use it as a template

...will be pursued through legal channels including DMCA takedowns.

---

**© 2025 IA-PME. All rights reserved.**
